Confusion

The caster selects a target location. Everyone within 2 m (1") per point of force is subject to a malign brain fog. Everyone who fails to resist the spell is confused, and on their turn must roll a 1d6 to find out what they do: 1-2 attack an ally, 3-4 do nothing, 5-6 act normally.
